## TreePropsBase.contentButtonProps property

Override props for the main button used to render each tree item's content. Note that this includes the iconProps if you want to customize how the item's icon (if any) looks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
contentButtonProps?: IButtonProps;
```
